description: This file defines the React component 'AuthGate' which manages authentication gating for child components based on authentication status and configuration.

methods.name: AuthGate({ requireAuth = false, fallback = null, children })
methods.description: React functional component that conditionally renders its children based on authentication state, loading status, and configuration.
